nodes.id: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

location.zh-cn: 北京市阜外大街路南22号院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经下设的一个部，于1970年由第一轻工业部、第二轻工业部、纺织工业部合并而成，1993年撤销。
description.en: A former ministry under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, formed in 1970 by the merger of the First Ministry of Light Industry, the Second Ministry of Light Industry, and the Ministry of Textile Industry, and dissolved in 1993.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1965年至1970年间设立的国务院组成部门，由原轻工业部改名而成。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China from 1965 to 1970, renamed from the former Ministry of Light Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1965年至1970年间设立的国务院组成部门，由中央手工业管理总局改建而成。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China from 1965 to 1970, established from the former Central Administration of Handicraft Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个组成部门，负责管理纺织工业。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the administration of the textile industry.

description.zh-cn: 在中华人民共和国轻工业部撤销后成立的机构，负责管理轻工业。
description.en: An organization established after the dissolution of the Ministry of Light Industry of the PRC to manage the light industry sector.

description.zh-cn: 1998年至2001年间存在的国家机构，由中国轻工总会改组而成，隶属于国家经贸委。
description.en: A state agency that existed from 1998 to 2001, reorganized from the China National Light Industry Council and subordinate to the State Economic and Trade Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个负责宏观经济调控的部门。
description.en: A former department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for macroeconomic regulation.

description.zh-cn: 由国家轻工业局撤销后于2001年成立的全国性、综合性的轻工业组织。
description.en: A national and comprehensive light industry organization established in 2001 after the dissolution of the State Bureau of Light Industry.

en: Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的最高国家行政机关，是中华人民共和国国务院的前身。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ during the early years of the People's Republic of China, and the predecessor of the State Council.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府轻工业部

zh-cn: 中央人民政府轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期由政务院设立的部门，负责管理轻工业。
description.en: A department established by the Government Administration Council in the early days of the PRC to manage the light industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国曾两次设立的负责管理食品工业的国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the PRC responsible for the food industry, which was established on two separate occasions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1954年至1958年设立的管理手工业的中央机构。
description.en: A central agency of the People's Republic of China established to manage handicrafts from 1954 to 1958.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国地方工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国地方工业部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1954年至1956年设立的管理地方工业的国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China established to manage local industries from 1954 to 1956.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1961年至1965年设立的管理手工业的中央机构，后改建为第二轻工业部。
description.en: A central agency of the People's Republic of China established to manage handicrafts from 1961 to 1965, later reorganized into the Second Ministry of Light Industry.

nodes.id: 中华全国手工业合作总社

zh-cn: 中华全国手工业合作总社

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国手工业的全国性联合组织。
description.en: The national federation of handicraft cooperatives in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国轻工业部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Minister of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国陕西省的一所大学，曾为轻工业部部属高校。
description.en: A university located in Shaanxi, China, formerly affiliated with the Ministry of Light Industry.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省无锡市的一所大学，其前身之一曾为轻工业部部属高校。
description.en: A university in Wuxi, Jiangsu, China. One of its predecessors was affiliated with the Ministry of Light Industry.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河南省郑州市的一所大学，曾为轻工业部部属高校。
description.en: A university in Zhengzhou, Henan, China, formerly affiliated with the Ministry of Light Industry.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的一所大学，曾为轻工业部部属高校。
description.en: A university in Tianjin, China, formerly affiliated with the Ministry of Light Industry.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国福建省福州市的一所大学，曾为轻工业部部属高校。
description.en: A university in Fuzhou, Fujian, China, formerly affiliated with the Ministry of Light Industry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国轻工业部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国轻工业部是中华人民共和国国务院下设的一个部。
description.en: The Ministry of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China was a ministry under the State Council.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 1949年11月，政务院成立轻工业部。
description.en: In November 1949, the Government Administration Council established the Ministry of Light Industry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 1970年4月，第一轻工业部与第二轻工业部、纺织工业部合并，组建为中华人民共和国轻工业部。
description.en: In April 1970, the First Ministry of Light Industry merged with the Second Ministry of Light Industry and the Ministry of Textile Industry to form the Ministry of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 1970年4月，第二轻工业部与第一轻工业部、纺织工业部合并，组建为中华人民共和国轻工业部。
description.en: In April 1970, the Second Ministry of Light Industry merged with the First Ministry of Light Industry and the Ministry of Textile Industry to form the Ministry of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 1970年4月，纺织工业部与第一轻工业部、第二轻工业部合并，组建为中华人民共和国轻工业部。
description.en: In April 1970, the Ministry of Textile Industry merged with the First Ministry of Light Industry and the Second Ministry of Light Industry to form the Ministry of Light Industry of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国轻工业部
relationships.target: 中国轻工总会

description.zh-cn: 1993年6月，轻工业部撤销，成立中国轻工总会以接替其职能。
description.en: In June 1993, the Ministry of Light Industry was dissolved, and the China National Light Industry Council was established to succeed it.

relationships.target: 国家轻工业局

description.zh-cn: 1998年，撤销中国轻工总会，组建国家轻工业局。
description.en: In 1998, the China National Light Industry Council was dissolved, and the State Bureau of Light Industry was established.

relationships.target: 中国轻工业联合会

description.zh-cn: 2001年2月，国家轻工业局撤销，成立中国轻工业联合会。
description.en: In February 2001, the State Bureau of Light Industry was dissolved, and the China National Light Industry Federation was established.

relationships.target: 国家经济贸易委员会

description.zh-cn: 国家轻工业局隶属于国家经贸委。
description.en: The State Bureau of Light Industry was subordinate to the State Economic and Trade Commission.

relationships.target: 第二轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 1965年2月20日，撤销中央手工业管理总局，改建成立第二轻工业部。
description.en: On February 20, 1965, the Central Administration of Handicraft Industry was dissolved and reorganized into the Second Ministry of Light Industry.

relationships.source: 中华全国手工业合作总社
relationships.target: 中央手工业管理总局

description.zh-cn: 中华全国手工业合作总社与中央手工业管理总局合署办公。
description.en: The All-China Federation of Handicrafts Cooperatives and the Central Administration of Handicraft Industry worked in the same office.

relationships.source: 中华全国手工业合作总社
relationships.target: 第二轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 第二轻工业部同中华全国手工业合作总社合署办公。
description.en: The Second Ministry of Light Industry and the All-China Federation of Handicrafts Cooperatives worked in the same office.

description.zh-cn: 陕西科技大学曾是轻工业部的部属事业单位。
description.en: Shaanxi University of Science & Technology was once a public institution subordinate to the Ministry of Light Industry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 江南大学曾是轻工业部的部属事业单位。
description.en: Jiangnan University was once a public institution subordinate to the Ministry of Light Industry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 郑州轻工业大学曾是轻工业部的部属事业单位。
description.en: Zhengzhou University of Light Industry was once a public institution subordinate to the Ministry of Light Industry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 天津科技大学曾是轻工业部的部属事业单位。
description.en: Tianjin University of Science & Technology was once a public institution subordinate to the Ministry of Light Industry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国轻工业部

description.zh-cn: 福建理工大学曾是轻工业部的部属事业单位。
description.en: Fujian University of Technology was once a public institution subordinate to the Ministry of Light Industry.
